content: ghtLegForTripInfo_Query` result. #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: `id` * Insert and update operations are carried out using Unique Key. * No delete operation is performed, as the source system does not delete Flight Plan Trip Info records. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Service|Source Query|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | | |legId|`tripInfo`| |`legNo`| | |udor|`tripInfo`| |`flightDate`|Formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`| |carrier|`tripInfo`| |`carrier`| | |flightNumber|`tripInfo`| |`flightNo`| | |flightTime|`tripInfo`| |`flightTimeOrg`|Formatted as `hh:mm`| |regulatedFlightTime|`tripInfo`| |`flightTime`|Formatted as `hh:mm`| |departureAirport|`tripInfo`| |`origin`| | |arrivalAirport|`tripInfo`| |`destination`| | |acRegNo|`tripInfo`| |`acRegistration`|Formatted as `#####`| |acSubtype|`tripInfo`| |`acType`| | |numberOfCockpitCrew|`tripInfo`| |`cockpitCrew`| | |numberOfCabinCrew|`tripInfo`| |`cabinCrew`| | |pantryCode|`tripInfo`| |`pantry`| | |dow|`tripInfo`| |`dow`| | |regulatedDow|`tripInfo`| |`dowRgl`| | |doi|`tripInfo`| |`doi`| | |regulatedDoi|`tripInfo`| |`doiRgl`| | |matow|`tripInfo`| |`matow`| | |regulatedMatow|`tripInfo`| |`matowRgl`| | |tripFuel|`tripInfo`| |`tripFuelOrg`| | |regulatedTripFuel|`tripInfo`| |`tripFuel`| | |takeOffFuel|`tripInfo`| |`toFuel`| | |taxiFuel|`tripInfo`| |`taxiFuel`| | |blockFuel|`tripInfo`| |`blockFuel`| | |fuelRequest|`tripInfo`| |`fuelReqDest`|When `fuelReqDest` = “YES“ then “Y“, else “N“| |preparedBy|`tripInfo`| |`preparedBy`| | |versionNumber|`tripInfo`| |`version`| | |captainCrewId|`tripInfo`| |`createdBy`| | |confirmDate|`tripInfo`| |`createdDate`|Formatted as `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ`| |efbOfpNumber| |`Riverx_TripInfoSXSEFF_Query`|`OFP`| | |efbCockpitCrewList| |`Riverx_TripInfoSXSEFF_Query`|`Owner`|The values in the query result are sorted alphabetically and concatenated with a comma(“,”).|
